# PR Gate Checklist

- [ ] Execution packet fields were complete before implementation started.
- [ ] Writer-of-record rule was respected (single implementation writer on branch).
- [ ] Codex output report includes commands and results.
- [ ] Required validation commands passed locally.
- [ ] `/review` findings were addressed or documented.
- [ ] Regression and edge-case risks are explicitly listed.
- [ ] Final PR description includes residual risks and follow-ups.
